title: In The Irish Film 'Calvary,' A Priest's Crisis Of Faith Is Weirdly Jokey
teaser: John Michael McDonagh's new movie stars Brendan Gleeson as a priest who must eventually face off against a killer. It's excruciatingly obvious and inept, but Gleeson brings it alive.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
